dialog.speaker: Edger (Male)
dialog.utterance: But what's this? You're tracking blood into the kitchen.

dialog.speaker: Edger (Male)
dialog.utterance: Oh, dear. You've been nosy, haven't you?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Relax, this doesn't have to end badly.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Yeah. It's one of my better qualities.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: The murdering cannibal accuses me of being nosy?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: <Attack> I've seen enough from you people.

dialog.speaker: Edger (Male)
dialog.utterance: Of course not! What better end for the day than a meal around the family table? And what more noble purpose for you than to bring us together?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Or you let me go and I can send more meals your way.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I just came out of decades of hibernation. That can't make for good eating.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I can think of plenty.

dialog.speaker: Edger (Male)
dialog.utterance: Now there's an intriguing prospect. Forgo the promise of a fine dinner now for others down the road?

dialog.speaker: Edger (Male)
dialog.utterance: Martha, my dear, what do you say?

dialog.speaker: Martha (Female)
dialog.utterance: It seems the Eternal shall provide through our new friend.

dialog.speaker: Edger (Male)
dialog.utterance: And there we have it. Stop by any time, hm?

dialog.speaker: Martha (Female)
dialog.utterance: Nonsense! What the Eternal provides, we shall gladly accept.

dialog.speaker: Edger (Male)
dialog.utterance: And there you have it. Can't argue with that, can I?

dialog.speaker: Edger (Male)
dialog.utterance: Don't worry. We'll make this quick.

dialog.speaker: Martha (Female)
dialog.utterance: Quickly, my dear, he's getting agitated. We can't let the meat spoil.

dialog.speaker: Martha (Female)
dialog.utterance: How very rude.

dialog.speaker: Edger (Male)
dialog.utterance: Time to teach you some manners.
